title: 10 Exercises for Strength & Balance for Seniors // 30 minute Osteoporosis Friendly Workout
description:
Thank you for joining me for this full body workout that incorporates exercises for both strength and balance! This video is perfect for active seniors, those with osteoporosis and beginners.
I will take you through 10 compound movements that work all areas of the body.
I'm using 5 pound hand weights for the strength exercises. Slightly lighter or heavier is fine.
As always please go at your own pace and make sure you are comfortable with the movements before adding the balance challenge.

I hope you enjoy this strength building and balance workout! As always, thanks for working out with me and let me know how you liked it in the comments. 👍🏻

My shoes:
new-balance-athletics-inc.sjv.io/9gkqD5

Products that I use and recommend can be found here:
https://www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
as an Amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases 

SeniorShape is on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/SeniorShapefitness/


Strength training workout, strength building workout for seniors, senior shape, workout with dumbbells, full body strength workout, muscle building exercises for seniors, beginner strength exercises, workout for beginners, low impact workout, weight lifting for seniors, weight training for seniors, muscle toning workout for women, weight lifting for women, silver sneakers, balance workout, balance exercises for seniors, 30 minute workout, dumbbell workout
channelDescription:
Hello and welcome to SeniorShape with Lauren! I’m thrilled you have found my channel! I am an ACE (American Council on Exercise) certified fitness instructor. I also hold a specialization in senior fitness. 
It is my passion to create fun, new exercises and routines that are never boring. 
My videos are easy to follow and the exercises featured are specifically curated for beginners, and active older adults. The workouts are challenging and at a great pace that works well for anyone. 
Please subscribe so you never miss a new workout.

Equipment I use or recommend can be purchased on my Amazon store page www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
*as an Amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases

For those who have graciously asked to donate so I can continue to provide free videos can contribute through 
Venmo: @SeniorShape
I appreciate your support!

Thanks for working out with me!
Lauren

comments: I absolutely love your workouts!! I am so motivated by them and actually look forward to exercising everyday. I used to go to the gym and there is no comparison!  I can feel a difference with your workouts! Thanks!
Thanks Lauren, I just had a bone density test, and it came back as a better score.  I believe its because of your exercises.  Thank you so much.
Thank you, Lauren for a class that was challenging enough and effective.  Strength and balance, it's a win win!
Love this! I’m 66 years old and this was very helpful for me. Thank you!
I'm 71 and grateful for these workouts. My balance is getting better each day.
